item.description:
Get Motivated! Business Seminar
September 9, 2009. 8:00am-4:45pm
XL Center. One Civic Center Plaza. Hartford, CT
FREE for new CTREIA Member Registration and Member Renewal
$9.95 for CT REIA members
$29.00 for non-members

"Special Bonus" for Membership Renewal and New Membership!

Renew your membership by September 3rd
and receive 2 FREE tickets to this GREAT event
along with a free 124 page study guide!!!

Hurry... Time is Running Out!

You can attend this event...FREE! That’s right FREE...

• How to Stay Motivated - Zig Ziglar
• How to Lead Your Team to Victory - Joe Montana
• Take-Charge Leadership - General Colin Powell
• How to Strengthen Your Sales & Negotiation Skills -Tammara Lowe
• American’s Promise: You’re Keys to Growth & Opportunity - Steve Forbes
• The Tenacity to Persevere: How the Make it Through any Crisis - Rudy Giuliani
• Full Potential to live a successful, fulfilling life - Laura Bush

Attend the blockbuster Event praised and acclaimed by CNN, USA Today, TIME, PEOPLE The Wall Street Journal & the New York Times!

Renew your membership today and... Receive a FREE ticket to this GREAT event!!!

For more information, please visit: http://www.ctreia.com...

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Get Motivated! Business Seminar: Zig Ziglar, Joe Montana, Colin Powell, and more
